snippet: President Obama will not invoke a constitutional amendment to unilaterally increase the nation’s debt limit if a continued impasse with House Republicans causes that ceiling to be breached Oct. 17, his spokesman said.
abstract: President Obama will not invoke a constitutional amendment to unilaterally increase the nation’s debt limit if a continued impasse with House Republicans causes that ceiling to be breached Oct. 17, his spokesman said.

headline.main: Obama Will Not Unilaterally Raise Debt Limit
